page.title: 19Llandegai School
page.content: The school starts and finishes at the same time as most schools, nine till half past three. However on Fridays the children are allowed to do what ever they want. Every year a childs mother and father gets a report card on their childs progress. Llandegai competes against other schools in the interschool sports and have won a few shields and cups. Every year they also have their own sports day. Out of the 139 pupils only 100 have school dinners, the others are a mixture between children who go home for lunch and those that take packed lunches. If they are naughty they get sent to Mr.Jones the headmaster and either get a good telling off or a smack on the bottom.
